0x12B8D689.name: GET_EXTERNAL_KVP_INT
0x12B8D689.description: A getter for [SET_RESOURCE_KVP_INT](#\_0x6A2B1E8), but for a specified resource.

examples.code:
local kvpValue = GetExternalKvpInt('food', 'bananabread') 
if kvpValue then
	-- do something!
end

0x12B8D689.resultsDescription: A int that contains the value stored in the Kvp or nil/null if none.
